name: MicroVision, Inc.
description: MicroVision, Inc. is a technology company specializing in innovative laser beam scanning technology, primarily for use in advanced display and sensor applications. Founded in 1993 and headquartered in Redmond, Washington, MicroVision has developed a unique proprietary technology that enables high-resolution displays and advanced lidar solutions for automotive and IoT markets. The company's core product is its PicoP® scanning technology, which allows for compact and efficient projection systems capable of delivering high-quality images in various environments. This technology is applicable in diverse sectors including automotive, consumer electronics, and augmented reality, positioning MicroVision as a leader in next-generation display and sensing solutions. MicroVision aims to enhance the user experience through its cutting-edge technologies, driving innovation and providing enhanced capabilities for smart devices. The company is actively collaborating with partners to integrate its technology into vehicles for advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS) and autonomous driving solutions. With a strong focus on research and development, MicroVision is committed to maintaining its competitive edge in a rapidly evolving tech landscape, striving to create safer and more immersive environments through its laser scanning technology.
